name: Zip It!
description:
Zip It! is a platformer where you can't jump or move normally, and the only way to move is by zipping across.

Press, hold and release left click to zip towards your pointer. Do normal platforming things. Have fun!

(Made for the GMTK Jam 2018 by Diptoman Mukherjee, Pranjal Bisht and Joel Montpetit.)
